patthana15.80:4.1: Araṇaṃ sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.80:5.1: Araṇaṃ asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.80:6.1: Araṇaṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasaraṇo nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
